author: KenHerefordUK
title: small can be OK
text:
Like everyone else we were aware that the room was going to be small, but were shocked at how small that was when we arrived, we did even think of looking for somewhere else as we were in NY for a week. BUT somehow we got used to it and actually were pretty fond of it by the end of our stay. The Hudson is a bit bizarre in its design and huge public areas, but I guess that's part of its appeal. The positives are that the staff were all friendly and helpful and of course the location. We loved being so close to Central Park and the Lincoln Center. There were lots of things we wanted to see and do and it all seemed easy from the Hudson. So despite our early reservations we had a great week and would love to come back
